151915.「リサイクル委員長ちゃん\n いつも お仕事 ご苦労サマ～。\n 今日のご用は:
Thank you for your hard work, Recycling
Committee Chair. What can I do for you today,
Laura?<break>

151917.「……あら どうぐかばんが いっぱいヨ～。\n これじゃあ お礼が 渡せないワ。:
... Oh, my God, there's a whole bag of stuff... I can't thank you for this... <%nM_SLOT_NUM> Let's make some room here,
then we can talk...

151918.「あら <%sSKILL_NAME>の書は 習得中ヨ。\n 習得しているスキルノ:
Oh, the book <%sSKILL_NAME> is for learning... I'll take the skill notes you've already mastered. I'll just give you the ones
I haven't used yet.

151919.「それじゃあ <%sSKILL_NAME>の書は\n 回収しちゃうケド 本当にい:
So I'm going to retrieve the <%sSKILL_NAME>
book. Are you sure?<yesno2><break>

151920.「あら 復習は 大事よネ\n それじゃあ スキルノート回収のごほうびと\n 班の:
I'd like to explain the rewards for collecting the skill notebooks and the team's effort rate. For every 10 skill notebooks we
collect, we'll exchange them for a reward. Of course, discarded notes also count... But I can only collect 100 at a time... But I can
only collect 100 notebooks at a time... and even if I receive more than that, they won't count unless I receive a reward... The team's
effort rate will be determined by the total amount of skill notebooks collected by the chairperson's team... I'll give you a reward
for 100 percent... If you don't receive a reward for your team's effort, it will be stocked up, so be sure to check it when you
come to class... Even if we change classes, I'll be sure to let my sisters know how hard you've been working. I... As for the
explanation... I'm tired from all the talking...

151921.「あら リサイクル委員長ちゃん\n スキルノート回収の ごほうびについて\n く:
I haven't told you in detail about the rewards for collecting the Skill Notes, so I'll explain in detail... You can find out
how many Skill Notes you've collected and your team's rate of effort by talking to me... Every 10 skill notebooks you collect
will be exchanged for a reward... Of course, the notebooks you discarded will count... But I'm only allowed to collect 100 at a time.
But I can only collect 100 at a time... and any more than that will count if I don't receive a reward... The team's effort rate
will be determined by the total amount of skill notebooks collected by the chairperson's team... I'll give you a reward
for 100 percent... If you don't receive a reward for your team's effort, it will be stocked up, so be sure to check it when you
come to class... I'll be sure to let my sisters know how hard you've been working, even if we have to switch classes. We've
talked about this a lot, but if you'd like to review it, just click "Ask for clarification" and we'll talk about it again. Well then...

151922.<pc>は リサイクルの ごほうびとして\n<%sM_ITEM>を <%dM_N:
<pc> has gotten <%dM_NUM> of <%sM_ITEM> as a
reward for recycling!
<se_nots System 7><end>

151923.「すごいワ 班のガンバ率が １００パーセント！\n 委員長ちゃんの班は すっごく:
That's amazing! The team's effort rate is 100
percent! The chairwoman's group is really
good. We all did our best. Receiving...<end>

151924.「回収したスキルノートは <%nNOTE_NUM>冊だかラ\n リサイクル賞のお:
The skill notebooks I collected are <%nNOTE_NUM>books, and I'd like to thank you for the recycling prize <%nITEM_NUM>here...
Thanks for all your help... Thank you!

151925.「リサイクルの協力 ありがとう 委員長ちゃん\n 引き続き クルンと お仕事ガン:
Thank you for your help with the recycling,
Mr. Chairman, and good luck with your work.<end>

151926.「……あら スキルノートが １冊もないわヨ。\n リサイクル委員長ちゃんたら お:
... Oh, I don't have any of my skill notebooks... Are you tired, Recycling Committee Chair? If you have any notes you
don't want, you can keep them... And you can give them to me, or you can send them to me if you've given up on getting them.

151927.「どのスキルノートを 受け取ればいいカシラ？\n<break>: Which skill notes do you want me to take?<break>

151928.「ほかに 何かご用は あるかしラ？\n<break>: Is there anything else I can do for you?<break>

151929.<se_nots Joutyu_SE 39>\n<pc>は <%sSKILL_N:
<se_nots Joutyu_SE 39>
<pc> gave the <%sSKILL_NAME> Book.
You've given the Bag o' Books
<%dNOTE_NUM> Skill Notebooks so far.

151937.「……あら 回収したノート数が いっぱいヨ。\n もう ポシェットに 入りきらな:
... Oh, my God, the number of notes I collected... I can't even fit them in my pochette... I'm sorry, but can you get me my
reward first?

152917.「ごきげんクルルン。アタシは このクラスの\n スキルノート回収を 担当している:
Good day... I'm Kukuru Pochette, and I'm in charge of collecting skill notes for this class. I'm sorry, but I'm not in this class.
I'm sorry, but I'm only in this class...

153091.「悪いけれど アタシはこのクラス専任なノ。\n ご用は 自分の教室にいる 姉妹に:
I'm sorry, but I'm in this class exclusively.
I'm sorry, but I'm only in this class.<bw_break>

153092.「あら 今は渡せるごほうびは ないわヨ？\n アタシに スキルノートを１０冊以上:
Oh, I don't have any rewards to give you right now, do I? You'll have to give me at least 10 skill notebooks, or your team will
be at 100 percent...
